name: The Grady Group
description:
Here’s the story…
The Grady Group is a puzzle-horror game based off of the popular sitcom “The Brady Bunch”. Explore the haunted house for clues on how to escape and learn how each family member met a gruesome death. Watch out for those kids though...

Features:
  • A full story starring the Brady Grady family.
  • Sitcom style camera angles
  • A house designed just like on the Brady Bunch Grady Group TV show.
  • Creepy atmosphere and spooky puzzles

I hope you enjoy; make sure to rate and review :)

IMPORTANT NOTES:

  • Use WASD to move
  • Click to advance and exit dialogue
  • Click on objects to interact with them
  • *Press "C" to open the inventory dialogue*
  • Inspect items (in the inventory dialogue) for hints.
  • The upstairs cannot be reached for technical reasons (maybe in a later update)

Please report any bugs so I can fix them :D
This is (hopefully) not my Halloween game 🎃

JAM INFO:

  • This game was created for the TPS Fall Game Jam
  • The theme was "old" so I used an old TV show
  • I had 3 months for this and made it in 8 hours
  • Read the devlog on the development of this game ⬇⬇⬇
